titles: Nicomede a tragi-comedy translated out of the French of Monsieur Corneille by John Dancer as it was acted at the Theatre-Royal, Dublin / ; together with an exact catalogue of all the English stage plays printed till this present year 1671.
author: Corneille, Pierre, 1606-1684.
Dancer, John, fl. 1660-1675.
Kirkman, Francis, 1632-ca. 1680.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
